EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date - September 6, Pre-NBAA Conference Dinner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Save the Date – Pre-NBAA Conference Dinner <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pi9KZRAjkPU]]> Dear valued customers,
The Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Team and guest speaker Christine Lawson of Inmarsat look forward to having you join us for a fun night of great food, outstanding wine and even better company on the eve of the NBAA regional conference at MMU.
Date: Wednesday, September 6, 2017
Location:
J&K Steakhouse 56 South St, Morristown, NJ 07960
Time: 6 p.m.
You'll receive the official invitation next week. We look forward to seeing you in Morristown.
Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Team
